#Print information from the raster data
from osgeo import gdal  
gdal.UseExceptions()
access_key = TokenLibrary.getSecret('innosyn-pipeline-kv','GeospatialStorageAccountKey')
gdal.SetConfigOption('AZURE_STORAGE_ACCOUNT', 'rawdatajbqezt')
gdal.SetConfigOption('AZURE_STORAGE_ACCESS_KEY', access_key)  
dataset_info = gdal.Info('/vsiadls/innosyn/raw/sample_4326.tif')  #/vsiadls/<container_name>/path/to/image
print(dataset_info)

#Convert GeoTiff to PNG by using GDAL
tiff_in = "/vsiadls/innosyn/raw/sample_4326.tif"
png_out = "/vsiadls/innosyn/raw/sample_image.png"
options = gdal.TranslateOptions(format='PNG')
gdal.Translate(png_out, tiff_in, options=options)

import rasterio
from matplotlib import pyplot
src = rasterio.open("https://rawdatajbqezt.blob.core.windows.net/innosyn/raw/sample_4326.tif?sp=r&st=2022-06-07T03:07:33Z&se=2022-06-07T11:07:33Z&spr=https&sv=2020-08-04&sr=b&sig=TCTLE92hLrleXJXVk2JhWzvseSj1tNPMYgcUiCOoPow%3D")
pyplot.imshow(src.read(1))
pyplot.show()
